instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a losing picture after press enter when you log in to user profile
threads.message: hi guys. i hack of screen still have  very strange problem here. <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a . laptop powering up ok and showing me login profile. i put password in and press enter then laptop losing picture and when i look it on the back still have back light  but no picture. any idea?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a losing picture after press enter when you log in to user profile
threads.message: Have you tried another SSD?? Or booting on external drive?? PRAM reset???

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a losing picture after press enter when you log in to user profile
threads.message: yes of course. i done smc reset and pram  also when external fully working order hard drive is booting up. after when loading bar is show is getting black screen and stay like that but back light is still on

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a losing picture after press enter when you log in to user profile
threads.message: Ok. fixed!!! replaced <CHIP>U7320</CHIP> and also <CHIP>U7200</CHIP> and now is working ok. thx for trying to help :)
